By logging, you agree to our: By logging, you agree to our
You don't have an account yet. Do you wa: You don't have an account yet?
onboarding_subtitle1: Donate blood to help those in need. Your single act can save multiple lives. Start making a difference today.
onboarding_subtitle2: Find nearby donation centers, book appointments, and track your donations — all in one place. Making a positive impact has never been this simple.
onboarding_subtitle3: Receive alerts when there’s a blood shortage or when your blood type is urgently needed. Be ready to help at the right moment.
Please select your account type to proce: Please select your account type to proceed, whether you want to donate or represent a hospital in need of support. Choose the option that best suits your role to help contribute to healthcare services.
We're excited to have you back! We can't: We're excited to have you back! We can't wait to see the impact you've made since you last used the app.
In our app, we take the security of your: In our app, we take the security of your information seriously
Register now and start exploring all the: Register now and start exploring all the features our app has to offer. We're excited to have you join our community of donors and help save lives!
please enter your date of last blood don: Please enter your date of last blood donation
Are there any chronic diseases or contra: Are there any chronic diseases or contraindications to donation (prohibited diseases can be clarified, such as infectious or chronic diseases that prevent donation
Create Account For Hospital Or Blood Cen: Create Account For Hospital Or Blood Center
Please Enter Hospital Name Or Blood Name: Please Enter Hospital Name Or Blood Name
Register now to join our network of trus: Register now to join our network of trusted healthcare facilities. Manage donations, connect with donors, and play a vital role in saving lives!
Please provide proof of your hospital's/: Please provide proof of your hospital's/center's blood donation authorisation
bad_code_verifier: Returned from the PKCE flow where the provided code verifier does not match the expected one. Indicates a bug in the implementation of the client library.
bad_json: HTTP body is not valid JSON.
bad_jwt: JWT in Authorization header is not valid.
bad_oauth_callback: OAuth callback from provider to Auth lacks required attributes.
bad_oauth_state: OAuth state is not in correct format. Indicates an OAuth provider integration issue.
captcha_failed: Captcha verification failed. Check captcha integration.
conflict: General database conflict, possibly due to concurrency issues.
email_address_not_authorized: Email sending not allowed for this address with the default SMTP service.
email_conflict_identity_not_deletable: Unlinking would change account to an existing email.
email_exists: Email address already exists in the system.
email_not_confirmed: Sign-in denied as the email is unconfirmed.
email_provider_disabled: Email and password signups are disabled.
flow_state_expired: PKCE flow state expired. Ask the user to sign in again.
flow_state_not_found: PKCE flow state not found. Possibly due to retrying a request.
hook_timeout: Unable to reach hook within maximum time.
hook_timeout_after_retry: Unable to reach hook after maximum retries.
identity_already_exists: The identity is already linked to a user.
identity_not_found: Identity does not exist or was unlinked.
mfa_challenge_expired: MFA challenge expired. Request a new challenge.
mfa_factor_name_conflict: MFA factors should not share the same name.
mfa_ip_address_mismatch: MFA enrollment must start and end on the same IP.
mfa_verification_failed: MFA verification failed due to incorrect TOTP code.
no_authorization: Authorization header is required but missing.
oauth_provider_not_supported: OAuth provider is disabled on server.
otp_disabled: OTP sign-in disabled. Check server configuration.
otp_expired: OTP code expired. Ask the user to sign in again.
over_email_send_rate_limit: Too many emails sent. Wait before trying again.
over_request_rate_limit: Too many requests. Try again later.
over_sms_send_rate_limit: Too many SMS messages sent. Try again later.
phone_not_confirmed: Sign-in denied as phone is unconfirmed.
same_password: Password change requires a new password.
saml_assertion_no_email: No email found in SAML assertion.
saml_assertion_no_user_id: No user ID found in SAML assertion.
saml_metadata_fetch_failed: Failed to fetch SAML provider metadata.
single_identity_not_deletable: Cannot delete the only identity of a user.
sms_send_failed: Failed to send SMS. Check SMS provider.
user_already_exists: User with these details already exists.
user_banned: User is banned until a specified time.
user_sso_managed: SSO-managed users cannot update certain fields.
(Hospital Or Blood Center) Created Accou: (Hospital Or Blood Center) Created Account Successfully
Are you sure to log out of your account?: Are you sure to log out of your account?
minimum_donor_age: What is the minimum age for a blood donor?
universal_blood_donor: Which blood type can donate to all other types?
donation_frequency: How often can I donate blood?
amount_of_blood_donated: How much blood is taken during a donation?
donate_with_cold: Can I donate if I have a cold?
blood_recovery_time: How long does it take to recover the donated blood?
health_risks_donation: Are there any health risks to donating blood?
dietary_restrictions: Are there dietary restrictions before donating blood?
benefits_of_donation: What are the benefits of donating blood?
know_recipient: Can I know who will receive my blood?
donation_duration: How long does the blood donation process take?
medication_donation: Can I donate if I am on medication?
general_conditions: What are the general conditions for blood donation?
diabetes_donation: Can I donate if I have diabetes?
rare_blood_types: What is the rarest blood type?
travel_donation: Can I donate if I have traveled recently?
fasting_donation: Do I need to fast before donating blood?
answer_minimum_donor_age: Donors must be at least 18 years old.
answer_universal_blood_donor: Blood type O- can donate to all other types.
answer_donation_frequency: Men can donate every 3 months, and women every 4 months.
answer_is_blood_donation_safe: Yes, blood donation is safe and uses sterile, single-use equipment.
answer_amount_of_blood_donated: About 450 ml of blood is taken during each donation.
answer_donate_with_cold: No, you must be in good health and free of infectious diseases.
answer_blood_recovery_time: Plasma is replenished within 24 hours, and blood cells within a few weeks.
answer_health_risks_donation: There are no major health risks, but donors might feel light-headed.
answer_pregnancy_donation: No, pregnant women are not allowed to donate blood.
answer_dietary_restrictions: It is recommended to eat a light meal and avoid fatty foods before donating.
answer_benefits_of_donation: Blood donation helps improve heart health and saves lives.
answer_know_recipient: No, blood donation is anonymous to protect privacy.
answer_medication_donation: It depends on the medication; consult your doctor.
answer_general_conditions: You must be in good health, weigh at least 50 kg, and be 18 years or older.
answer_diabetes_donation: You can donate if your diabetes is under control and you are not on insulin.
answer_rare_blood_types: AB- is one of the rarest blood types.
answer_travel_donation: It depends on the country you visited; check local restrictions.
answer_fasting_donation: No, it is recommended to eat a light meal beforehand.
answer_nursing_mothers_donation: Wait 6 months after delivery before donating blood.
faq_1_question: What is the blood donation app?
faq_1_answer: An app designed to facilitate blood donations and connect donors with recipients.
faq_2_question: How can I register in the app?
faq_2_answer: You can register using your email or phone number.
faq_3_question: Can I request blood through the app?
faq_3_answer: Yes, you can submit a request for blood easily.
faq_4_question: How can I check my eligibility to donate blood?
faq_4_answer: The app provides guidelines to help you check your eligibility.
faq_5_question: What are the conditions for donating blood?
faq_5_answer: You should be healthy and free from chronic illnesses.
faq_6_answer: Donors are selected based on blood type compatibility with the patient.
faq_7_answer: Yes, donating blood is safe, and all health precautions are taken.
faq_8_question: Can I find the nearest donation center?
faq_8_answer: Yes, the app allows you to search for the nearest center.
faq_9_question: How often can I donate blood?
faq_9_answer: You can donate every 3 months for men and every 4 months for women.
faq_10_question: What are the benefits of donating blood?
faq_10_answer: It helps save lives and improves blood circulation.
faq_11_question: Does the app provide alerts for urgent donations?
faq_11_answer: Yes, you will receive notifications for emergency cases.
faq_12_question: Can I contact donors or recipients?
faq_12_answer: Yes, the app facilitates secure communication.
faq_13_question: How can I update my personal information?
faq_13_answer: You can update your information through the settings page.
faq_14_answer: Yes, the app is completely free.
faq_15_answer: Comprehensive medical checks are conducted before donation.
faq_16_question: What blood types can be donated?
faq_16_answer: All blood types can be donated as needed.
faq_17_question: Can I cancel my donation request?
faq_17_answer: Yes, you can cancel the request at any time.
faq_18_question: Can I track my request status?
faq_18_answer: Yes, the app provides real-time status tracking.
faq_19_answer: Yes, the app offers a record of donors.
faq_20_question: How can I report a problem?
faq_20_answer: You can report any issue via the support page.
faq_body: The Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) page is a comprehensive guide designed to help users understand how to use the blood donation app with ease. It provides clear answers to common questions such as how to register, request blood, and the eligibility criteria for donation. The page also highlights the benefits of blood donation and ensures users are informed about the safety of the process. If your question is not answered here, feel free to contact the support team for assistance.
faq_title:
We’re here to help you with
anything and everything about blood donation app.
